name: Watch Your Step (kalle13)
description:
Watch Your Step is a short puzzle game created for Ludum Dare 43. The theme for LD43 was "sacrifices must be made", and I would say that Watch Your Step fits this theme only loosely at best (if only I had more time...). I should state that the game does not require you to kill the player to advance.

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Z to undo

R to restart level

ESC to pause

Q to quit (while paused or at main menu)

minus (-) and equals (=) keys can be used to change levels
